name: Racer Drones
description:
Race with against drones!

Description:

Game theme:

In a sci-fi theme, you're tasked to race in 3 different maps against a variety of sci-fi drones. Master your drone and overcome your opponents in the first place. 30+ different races to challenge your skill!

Features:

Responsive drone controls

30+ races for you to complete! Unlockable drones for you to unlock!

3 Detailed race maps for you to race on!

Over 8 different drones to race against.

Controls:

WASD To move Left, Right Arrow keys to rotate your drone Up and down arrow to move your drone up and down

MORE INFORMATION
